value:
$WmMPID_水着ルフレ女,ch04_08_Reflet_F_Swim17,Face|$w0|Ha! We've caught you! This is all part
of our vaca— I mean...all part of the
plan.$k$p$WmMPID_水着ガイア,ch04_06_Guire_M_Swim17,Face|$w0|Finding a good place on this beach
to set this trap was no easy task,
let me tell you.$k$p$WmMPID_水着フレデリク,ch04_16_Frederik_M_Swim17,Face|$w0|Robin, please be aware that I have
collected all the shells. Your feet will
not be in danger in the coming battle.$k$p$WmMPID_水着チキ覚醒,ch04_12_Tiki_F_Swim17,Face|$w0|It all comes down to this. Win, and
we'll be freed from the contract.$k$p$WmMPID_水着ルフレ女,ch04_08_Reflet_F_Swim17,Face|$w0|I'm afraid we can't take it easy
on you.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_水着ルフレ女,ch04_08_Reflet_F_Swim17,Face|$w0|A brilliant showing! We've seen
your full power.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Smile|$w0|All right! Now I can snap all the
swimsuit shots I want!
Hehehe...$k$p$WmMPID_水着フレデリク,ch04_16_Frederik_M_Swim17,Face|$w0|About that... The Anna from our world
bade me deliver this letter to you.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Huh? One of my "sisters" from your
world wrote me a letter? Let's see
here...$k$p$EFace_Anger|"To whom it may concern: If the
likenesses of Heroes from my world
are captured for any reason...$k$pA contract fee must be paid... As
detailed in the attached document"?!$k$p$EFace_Pain|This number... There are...so many
zeros! There's no way I can afford
this!$k$pGrr... I should have expected this...$k$p$WmMPID_水着チキ覚醒,ch04_12_Tiki_F_Swim17,Face|$w0|Let that be a lesson. Enjoy summer
for what it is. Don't worry about
money.$k$pAfter all, summer comes only once
a year!$k$p$WmMPID_水着ルフレ女,ch04_08_Reflet_F_Swim17,Face|$w0|She's right. Instead of making money,
make some summer memories!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|$w0|Oh, that sounds like fun! Don't you
think so, Alfonse? And I bet that
$Nu agrees!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Smile|$w0|Fighting her on this would be a losing
battle...for any of us. So...shall we?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|I'm not beat yet! I'll...I'll sell this golden
sand! Or those seashells! Hand 'em
over, Frederick!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|$w0|Oh, no you won't! It's a beautiful day
at the beach, Commander, and you're
going to enjoy it!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|W-wait! I can't—
I just need—
...Ugh, all right. Let's go.$k$p$EFace_Cool|Hey, can I at least snap a group shot
to remember the day?$k$pAnd if a few copies leak out...
Hehehe!$k$p$Sbs150|
